  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class BoilerControlInboundPort
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.AbstractInboundPort
implements BoilerControlCI
    The class BoilerControlInboundPort implements an inbound port for the BoilerControlCI component interface.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant              true
